issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Cast to timestamps on Druid time column leads to an exception

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
{code}
SELECT CAST(`ssb_druid_100`.`__time` AS DATE) AS `x_time`,
SUM(`ssb_druid_100`.`metric_c`) AS `sum_lo_revenue_ok`
FROM `default`.`druid_test_table` `ssb_druid_100`
GROUP BY CAST(`ssb_druid_100`.`__time` AS DATE);
{code}

fields.summary: Druid Storage handler throws exception when query has a Cast to Date

comments.body: very related issue that can be tackled in one patch
